name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Epic Games Store - Free Games Reminder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds you to claim the daily or weekly free games from Epic Games Store.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
=== Features ===
- Clicking the extension displays the current free games available
- Automatically notifies you when new games are released via Chrome Notifications
- Clicking on the notification will create new tabs of the new free games' store pages 
- This extension will have a green badge with the word "FREE" when new free games are available

=== For a better experience ===
- Pin this extension to easily see the green badge reminder

=== How it works ===
This extension calls the official free games listing API from Epic Games Store at "https://store-site-backend-static-ipv4.ak.epicgames.com/freeGamesPromotions". It returns JSON data with current and future free games information such as the store URL, images and titles.

=== Privacy ===
Your data is not collected.

=== Suggestions ===
Feel free to email me to suggest new features.
